Package io.atomix.protocols.raft.roles

Provides classes for role-based management of leader election and replication in the Raft consensus protocol.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RaftRole
    Raft role interface.
  • Class Summary

    AbstractRole
    Abstract state.
    ActiveRole
    Abstract active state.
    CandidateRole
    Candidate state.
    FollowerRole
    Follower state.
    InactiveRole
    Inactive state.
    LeaderRole
    Leader state.
    PassiveRole
    Passive state.
    PromotableRole
    Promotable role.

Package io.atomix.protocols.raft.roles Description

Provides classes for role-based management of leader election and replication in the Raft consensus protocol.
